item.title: I Ran a 14-Day Jumbo Loan Officer Selection Sprint
item.description: Most jumbo borrowers assume the right loan officer will magically appear when they email a private bank. I learned the hard way that the selection cycle matters as much as the rate sheet. My household carries income from a tech salary, venture distributions, and vesting stock, so documentation sprawl kills momentum. I decided to run a 14-day sprint to identify an officer who could keep up. Here is what I documented for every step so you can reuse the process.
